Class ResultsControl

java.lang.Object
com.brestats.control.ResultsControl
public class ResultsControl extends Object
Controller of Results.fxml view

      The grid pane containing all checkboxes of cities to show in table and charts

    • selectAllData

      private javafx.scene.control.CheckBox selectAllData
      The checkbox which controls all data's checkboxes

    • tableView

      private javafx.scene.control.TableView<ResultsControl.TableData> tableView
      The table containing average data on selected cities. More precisely, it is ResultsControl.TableData-typed, which each instance contains a selected city's data

    • averageChart

      private javafx.scene.chart.BarChart<String,Double> averageChart
      The average bar chart, representing the same data as the table

    • evolutionChart

      private javafx.scene.chart.LineChart<Double,Double> evolutionChart

      Array of the selected cities in main view

    • shownCities

      private ArrayList<Commune> shownCities
      The cities to show among selected ones. A city is shown if its checkbox is selected

    • cityLabels

      private ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Label> cityLabels
      Array of city's name label. They are shown in cityLabelsGrid

    • tableRows

      private ArrayList<ResultsControl.TableData> tableRows
      Array of ResultsControl.TableData objects, one for each table row or bar chart bar

      Array of city's name checkboxes

      public ResultsControl()
      Initialize empty Array Lists

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize page elements, like the map, the charts and the checkboxes

    • handleAddNewCity

      public void handleAddNewCity(javafx.event.ActionEvent ev)
      Action event listener for the "Ajouter une ville" button. It loads the main page and pass the actual selected cities (displayed in red on the main page)
      Parameters:
      ev - action event from the button

    • handleSelectAllCities

      public void handleSelectAllCities(javafx.event.ActionEvent ev)
      Action event listener for the Select all cities checkbox. Set all city's checkboxes' selected property at the same state as this one
      Parameters:
      ev - Action event

    • handleSelectAllData

      public void handleSelectAllData(javafx.event.ActionEvent ev)
      Action event listener for the Select all data checkbox. Set all data's checkbox's selected properties at the same state as this one
      Parameters:
      ev - Action event

    • handleEdit

      public void handleEdit(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent ev)
      Mouse clicked event listener for the edit button. Display the login page
      Parameters:
      ev - Mouse event

    • handleSelectDataCheckBox

      public void handleSelectDataCheckBox(javafx.scene.control.CheckBox checkBox)
      Called when a data checkbox's selected property is changed, directly by user of by the select all data checkbox
      Parameters:
      checkBox - a data checkbox on the page

    • addSelectedCity

      public void addSelectedCity(Commune city)
      Called from MainControl when search button is clicked. Add the selected city in the page (map, cities' list, checkbox, table and charts)
      Parameters:
      city - The selected city in Main page

    • createCityLabel

      public void createCityLabel(Commune city)
      Create the city name display in the page
      Parameters:
      city - The city of which label is created

    • reloadView

      public void reloadView()
      Procedure which reload all the page when a changing is made. Call refreshSelectShownCitiesGrid(), refreshTable() and refreshCharts()

    • refreshSelectShownCitiesGrid

      public void refreshSelectShownCitiesGrid()
      Procedure which reload the checkboxes of cities in the bottom left settings pane. A checkbox is created for each city

    • refreshTable

      public void refreshTable()
      Procedure which reload the top left table. Show the cities of which checkbox is selected

    • refreshCharts

      public void refreshCharts()
      Procedure which reload charts with selected cities and data

    • transformToJavascriptArray

      private String transformToJavascriptArray(ArrayList<Double> arr)
      Transform a javaArrayList object to javascript array
      Parameters:
      arr - the java array object
      Returns:
      the javascript object as String
